Funny Man

Ano: 1994

Sinopse: The lucky music producer and gambler Max Taylor wins a manor from Callum Chance in poker game, he travels with his wife and two children to the house. Meanwhile, his loser brother Johnny Taylor travels in a van to deliver Max's belonging to the family in the house and gives a ride to three hitchhikers. What they do not know is that the jester demon The Funny Man lives in the manor and is thirsty for blood.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
